# Observatory (Building)
## Overview
**Observatory**

**Create** 32 Goods, 4 Influence, 31 Labor, 2 Magic (1,580 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Observation Dome (Room)|Observation Dome]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Scriptorium (Room)|Scriptorium]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A high dome or tower with optical devices for viewing the heavens.
